name: us-atlas
description: Roll your own TopoJSON from the National Atlas one million-scale dataset.

scripts.postpublish: VERSION=`node -e 'console.log(require("./package.json").version)'`; git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../us-atlas/us/10m.json us-10m.v1.json && git add us-10m.v1.json && git commit -m "us-atlas ${VERSION}" && git push && cd -
